GV05isupsb_u:247: tena pātreṇeva apidhānabhūtena satyasyaivādityamaṇḍalasthasya brāhmaṇo 'pihitam ācchāditaṃ mukhaṃ dvāram /
GV05isupsb_u:248: tattvaṃ he pūṣannapāvṛṇvapasāraya satyasya upāsanātsatyaṃ dharmo yasya mama so 'haṃ satyadharmā tasmai mahyamathavā yathābhūtasya dharmasyānuṣṭhātre dṛṣṭaye tava satyātmana upalabdhaye //15//
GV05isupsb_u:250: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ |
GV05isupsb_u:251: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi
GV05isupsb_u:252: he pūṣan! jagataḥ poṣaṇātpūṣā ravistathaika eva ṛṣati gacchati
GV05isupsb_u:253: ityekarṣiḥ-- he ekarṣe! tathā sarvasya saṃyamanādyamaḥ-- he yama! tathā raśmīnāṃ prāṇānāṃ rasānāñca svīkaraṇāt sūryaḥ-- he sūrya!
GV05isupsb_u:254: prajāpaterapatyaṃ prājāpatyaḥ-- he prājāpatya! vyūha vigamaya raśmīnsvān /
GV05isupsb_u:256: yatte tava rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamam atyantaśobhanaṃ tatte tavātmanaḥ prasādāt paśyāmi /
GV05isupsb_u:257: kiñcāhaṃ na tu tvāṃ bhṛtyavadyāce yo 'sāvādityamaṇḍalastho vyāhṛtyavayavaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣākāratvātpūrṇaṃ vānena prāṇabuddhayātmanā jagatsamastamiti
GV05isupsb_u:258: puruṣaḥ puri śayanādvā puruṣaḥ so 'hamasmi bhavāmi //16//
GV05isupsb_u:260: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram |
GV05isupsb_u:261: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara || IsUp_17 ||
GV05isupsb_u:268: he krato! saṅkalpātmaka! smara yanmama smartavyaṃ tasya kālo 'yaṃ
GV05isupsb_u:270: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ bhāvitaṃ kṛtamagne smara yanmayā bālyaprabhṛtyanuṣṭhitaṃ karma tacca smara
GV05isupsb_u:274: agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān |
GV05isupsb_u:275: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te nama uktiṃ vidhema || IsUp_18 ||
GV05isupsb_u:276: he agne! naya gamaya supathā śobhanena mārgeṇa /
GV05isupsb_u:278: nirviṇṇo 'haṃ dakṣiṇena mārgeṇa gatāgatalakṣaṇenāto yāce tvāṃ punaḥ
GV05isupsb_u:280: rāye dhanāya karmaphalabhogāyetyarthaḥ, asmānyathoktadharmaphalaviśiṣṭān viśvāni sarvāṇi he deva! vayunāni karmāṇi prajñānāni vā vidvāñjānan /
GV05isupsb_u:281: kiñca yuyodhi viyojaya vināśaya asmadasmatto juhurāṇaṃ kuṭilaṃ vañcanātmakamenaḥ pāpam /
GV05isupsb_u:282: tato vayaṃ viśuddhāḥ santa iṣṭaṃ prāpsyāma ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:283: kintu vayamidānīṃ te na śaknumaḥ paricaryāṃ kartum /
GV05isupsb_u:284: bhūyiṣṭhāṃ bahutarāṃ te tubhyaṃ nama uktiṃ namaskāravacanaṃ vidhema namaskāreṇa paricarema ityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:286: ' (ī.u.11) 'vināśena mṛtyuṃ tīrtvāsambhūtyāmṛtamaśnute' (ī.u.14) iti śrutvā kecitsaṃśayaṃ kurvanti /
GV05isupsb_u:294: yathā ca na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtānīti śāstrādavagataṃ punaḥ śāstreṇaiva bādhyate 'dhvare paśuṃ hiṃsyāditi /

GV05isupsb_u:299: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ceti vacanādavirodha iti cet?
GV05isupsb_u:305: na hyagniruṣṇaḥ prakāśaśceti vijñānotpattau yasminnāśraye tadutpannaṃ tasminnevāśraye śīto 'gniraprakāśo vetyavidyāyā utpattirnāpi saṃśayo
GV05isupsb_u:307: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ"(ī.u.7) iti śokamohādyasambhavaśruteḥ /
